examples.korean: She put a dab of perfume behind her ears. 발음듣기 그녀는 귀 뒤에 향수를 한 방울 뿌렸다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She put a dab of perfume behind her ears. 발음

examples.korean: She dabbed a little perfume behind her ears. 발음듣기 그녀는 귀 뒤에 향수를 살짝 발랐다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She dabbed a little perfume behind her ears. 발음

examples.korean: to look back nostalgically to your childhood 발음듣기 자기 어린 시절을 향수 어린 마음으로 돌아보다 Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: to look back nostalgically to your childhood 발음

examples.korean: He caught a whiff of her perfume. 발음듣기 그는 그녀의 향수 냄새가 살짝 스치는 것을 감지했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He caught a whiff of her perfume. 발음

examples.korean: He remembered their childhood meetings with nostalgia. 발음듣기 그는 그들이 어린 시절에 만났던 일들을 향수에 젖어 기억했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He remembered their childhood meetings with nostalgia. 발음
